exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

In environment server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \ otin clients Huniq : uniq clients n : nat_eqType d : dstatelet C : LockCoh d H : n \\in nodes Heq : (n == server) = false Unable to unify "(?M1574 \\in nodes) = true" with "(n \\in clients) = true".
Wrong bullet *: Current bullet * is not finished.

original: intros n d C Hn. split. - apply (state_coh _ _ C Hn). - destruct (n == server) eqn:Heq. + exists ss. rewrite (eqP Heq). reflexivity. + split. * apply client_nodes, client_not_server, Heq. * destruct (getLocal n d) as [cs|ss] eqn: Hget. { exists cs. reflexivity. } { exfalso. apply (Hnin n). apply (coh_dom_upd n d). apply Hn. apply C. }
